1. A team may consist of a maximum of 4 members. 
2. A team may comprise of members from different colleges. 
3. An individual cannot be a member of more than one team. 
4. Participants must bring their COLLEGE I.D CARD. 
4. Participants should not share their robot with other teams. 
5 .Trial runs are not allowed before the event start, if people take a trial run, they may be disqualified.

The event organisers reserve the right to make modifications to any of rules if deemed necessary and their decision in any situation is final and binding on all.


Negative points: 
1. Participants can use two manual touches without points deduction, after which for each manual touch 10 points will be reduced. 
2. For each line crossing 5 points will be reduced.


SCORING PATTERN: 
The scores for the successful completion of each terrain will be revealed only on the day of the event.
